title: Low ping in one match and high ping in the next
body:
Hi guys, hopefully ya'll can help me.
So my problem is that i play one match and i have a constant all throught the game no lag spikes 40 ping and then the next it is a constant 130+ ping throughout the game with no spiking. Why does this happen? I have Timewarner Cable or known as Spectrum. This have been occuring since the new client alpha started and it happens on both legacy and new client.

replies.body:
Are you noticing this change, depending on when you're playing or what type of match it is? You may want to give your modem/router a quick reboot (unplug for 60 seconds) to see if anything changes.

Let me know what you experienced after the reboot.
It happens in aram as well as rift. Reboot did nothing.

In that case, there's likely an issue between your PC and our servers that is causing this to happen. I'd like you to run a traceroute log during a period of time you're experiencing the increased latency in-game. Additionally, I'd like you to use a networking app called [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) to run this traceroute. After loading up the app, simply paste **104.160.131.1** into the host field and start the trace. After 5 minutes has gone by, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you ran into any issues.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JQ0kp3mi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-30T04:00:38.178+0000)
>
> Are you noticing this change, depending on when you're playing or what type of match it is? You may want to give your modem/router a quick reboot (unplug for 60 seconds) to see if anything changes.
> 
> Let me know what you experienced after the reboot.

I've been experiencing the exact same thing, although i either get 25 ping, 40 ping, or 52 ping.
I've been having problems today too. Normal games I don't lag at all (45-50 MS) but then when I try to play RANKED, my MS is over 170+
